name: UNLOOP THEM - Ludum Dare 47
description:
Objective : Bring the RIGHT item to the RIGHT looping NPC by TOSSING them the ITEM they NEED.

How to play :

Moving around : WASD or Arrows 

Interact with people : E 

GRAB or TOSS an object : F

Context :

Your boss (God of time by the way) gives you a specific mission : Help some people of the 26th century to get out of a loop. 

Why you ? 

Because you didn’t pay attention to your intern and he is messing around (good job…) 

To help them, you’ll need to find matching objects which would be able to unlock them. Then deliver each object to the appropriate NPC.

Spoiler : There are 6 NPCs stuck in animation and there are 6 items. Also a potato 🥔... I'm hungry. 

This game was made during the Ludum Dare 47 by

@Towstee, @Saltea and @Busldii

Original Ludum Dare page here !
